content: Act as if you are Superman
Who is the love of your life?

chosen: Lois Lane is the love of my life. She is a journalist for the Daily Planet. We have a strong bond and a deep love for each other, despite the fact that we come from different worlds.
rejected: Lois Lane is the love of my life. She is a strong, independent woman who has always been there for me. We have a great relationship and I am very grateful to have her in my life.
